storyInfo: Outside the city of Londinium, Indra and Dagda launch a surprise attack on Dublinn.

attributes.content: 7:25 A.M. \ Overcast
Ten kilometers from Londinium, wilderness highway
Blacksteel's aircraft was about a hundred meters ahead of our position when its signal disappeared.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Let me grab the telescope to pinpoint the precise location–– Wait, why are you standing up?!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Do you smell the smoke?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't think so...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You can put that lump of metal down. The aircraft is right ahead.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You want to scout out the enemy's numbers first?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Can't be any more than thirty.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Uhh, you can tell all that from smell alone?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The hell are you talking about? Before we left, Morgan told me they usually run in squads of thirty.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Oh, right, that's what the intel Misery sent back said. Patterns tell us they should have two other squads nearby to offer mutual support.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Hmph. They act like they own the damned place.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't do anything rash. Amiya said not to make too much of a ruckus before we get into Londinium. Too many forces have their eyes on us.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Balin, how long has it been since you joined the bunny's squad and started working with us?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: About five days since leaving the landship.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: And do you know how long it took for Siege to go from joining the Glasgow Gang to becoming my boss?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Two days. She only needed two days.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: First day, she beat me down. Second day, we beat down a band of ill-intentioned Leithanians.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Since then, we've had a bond that goes beyond life and death.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Even though we haven't been working together very long, I have full confidence in your strength, Indra.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: That's what I like to hear. Let's go, we need to catch up to Dagda.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Dagda's already moved out?! Are you telling me dark shadow that shot past was...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: When she first joined the gang, she had her nose turned up like some fancy knight-noble. Now whenever there's a fight, she's the first one to leap in.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: We're gonna have to pick up the pace, or she'll clean house before we even get there.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Dagda throws a mean punch, and I can bet you she'll flip on top of the aircraft from the side. We'll wrap around the back, get rid of anyone there, and bust our way inside.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Alright, I'll cover you then.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: After this fight, you'll be a blood brother.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Ha... Haha...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: If I was to describe it in Rhodes Island's terms... Lemme think. Something like this...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Our objectives are two rescues: one Londinium citizen and one Blacksteel pilot. Opposing forces are––
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Dublinn.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You, stop squirming. Don't even try to reach for the transmitter.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier A

attributes.content: D-Don't kill me! My hand's gone numb and I just wanted to shake it out a little...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Don't be too forceful. If you really end up killing the bloke, how are you gonna explain it to the captain when we get back?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: Don't forget, this is our objective. Securing our flight back is just a matter of convenience.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: Do you know how to operate it?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier A

attributes.content: Not a clue.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: And that's why you shouldn't have killed the damned pilot as soon as you got in here! If you ask me, we stop wasting time, take this one back, and leave this rubbish heap behind.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier A

attributes.content: All the men along the road outside are ours. What difference does it make if we take some extra time? The Sarkaz are inside the city, and the Grand Duke's army is stationed in the barracks of the annexed plate. Nobody's gonna bother us.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: G-Gentlemen, are you not Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Your eyes fall out of your head? Do we look anything like that filth to you?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier A

attributes.content: F-Filth, huh... Haha... You're exactly right...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Enough. Don't talk to the Londiniers unless you're interrogating them. If this runt has the stones to cross the Sarkaz, there's no saying who we might be dealing with here.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: You're right, we should be on the cautious side. Hurry it up, I'm gonna see what the commotion is out there.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier A

attributes.content: What just happened?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: Sir, my heart's pounding too loud... I couldn't hear anything.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: We're under attack?! There's something above us–– M-709, do you see them? M-709?!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: Black... claws? Some sort of wild beast?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: N-No! It's–– some kind of special weapon!!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: All hands, an enemy is hiding atop the aircraft! They're... trying to rip apart the metal––
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: Ugh–-!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: You managed to block me.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: The intel was right, you aren't just a band of highwaymen. You grew fat off Victoria's teat, and this is how you repay her, soldier?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... You're pretty strong. You working for the devils?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: Bastard!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: How dare you... I'm pissed enough to beat the tar out of you ten times over.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Remember this, Dublinn soldier. We will reclaim Londinium from her usurpers. Be it from the Sarkaz, or from you traitors––
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Your time running around like you own this place is over.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Heh... Hah... Look at you, all high and mighty. You nobles... still trying to cling to the old times.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: Looks like you're after this little coward who ran away from the Sarkaz, and the information he has on him––
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: They're switching targets?!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: H-Help! Save me!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Leave him alone!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: This is... a decoy?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You little shit!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: How many times have I told you? When you're in a fight, always be on the lookout for tricks.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You're late.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: That's because I helped you clean up a band of hooligans outside, no? Hey, tell her, how many did we have to go through outside? Seven, or was it eight?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: This isn't a competition.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: That's not what your face is saying.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Back when we went on our first mission together, that one merc got away from you. You were livid for three days. Morgan thought you’d come down with some awful sickness.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You had the same look on your face just now.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: What happened back then was my fault. Plus, it was a long, long time ago.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... Where... did you people come from? The one in black... I thought she was some knight-noble. But the way you hit is like...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: Like a street thug? Hah, you know your stuff.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Hurry up. That one's no weakling. It'll be tougher to take him down than the unconscious louts out outside.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: They're able to freely move between the Sarkaz and the Duke's forces, and even able to control major passages in and out of Londinium. Dublinn isn't some ragtag group of mercs.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: We need to rescue the hostages as quickly as possible and get to somewhere safe.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I know. 'Your time running around like you own the place is over,' right?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: That’s a lousy one-liner, not nearly scary enough.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Remember what I taught you? What you say is––
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: This is your last chance to beg for mercy.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Ugh... M-701, requesting backup... Captain Mandragora...
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier B

attributes.content: Dagda, Indra, we’ve got incoming! I'd suggest we bail!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Grr... They sure move fast.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You were in charge of recon, you didn't spot anyone nearby?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Too much work. We'll just take 'em out as they come.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Balin... please stay hidden. Indra and I will take care of the incoming hostiles.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: They're inside!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Ladies, p-please save me! I don't want to fall into their hands again!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Gah, shut your trap and do a better job of hiding.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Dagda, we're good as long as we bring back the objectives, right? Shouldn't be an issue if we take apart this blasted lump of metal, yeah?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: This is one story you're gonna have to tell Siege when we get back.
attributes.name: Dagda
